name: Beer'em Up
description: Duffer and Amber, Gods of Beer and Dance, will get themselves involved in a frantic chase after Raisin, God of Wine. In an act of arrogance and envy, Raisin has stolen The Sacred Barrel, the only source of beer for the whole Island of Maltisa.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
